Module 2: Deploy and Scale Virtual K8s Workload¶

Here we’ll take a look at the process for deploying and scaling a vK8s workload via private container registry. This private container registry has been already configured for this lab.

  • Lab 1 - Review vK8s Cluster and Deploy vK8s Workload
  • Lab 2 - Scale vK8s Deployment
